employee_deduction.title: Employee Deduction
employee_deduction.description: The amount of money that is withheld from an employee's gross pay by the employee.

company_deduction.title: Company Deduction
company_deduction.description: The amount of money that is withheld on behalf of an employee by the company.

name.title: Name
name.description: The type of earning. Possible values include: SALARY, REIMBURSEMENT, OVERTIME, BONUS, or - in cases where there is no clear mapping - the original value passed through.

remote_id.title: Remote Id
remote_id.description: The third-party API ID of the matching object.

modified_at.title: Modified At
modified_at.description: This is the datetime that this object was last updated by UnifyX

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The day and time the benefit started.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The day and time the benefit ended.

HrisBenefit.title: HrisBenefit
HrisBenefit.description: The Benefit object is used to represent a benefit that an employee has enrolled in.

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Cursor value to fetch next set of items

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Indicates the count of items in the response

remote_id.title: Remote Id
remote_id.description: The third-party API ID of the matching object.

modified_at.title: Modified At
modified_at.description: This is the datetime that this object was last updated by UnifyX

pay_rate.title: Pay Rate
pay_rate.description: The position's pay rate in dollars.

pay_period.title: Pay Period
pay_period.description: The time period this pay rate encompasses. Possible values include: HOUR, DAY, WEEK, EVERY_TWO_WEEKS, SEMIMONTHLY, MONTH, QUARTER, EVERY_SIX_MONTHS, YEAR, or - in cases where there is no clear mapping - the original value passed through.

pay_frequency.title: Pay Frequency
pay_frequency.description: The position's pay frequency. Possible values include: WEEKLY, BIWEEKLY, MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, SEMIANNUALLY, ANNUALLY, THIRTEEN-MONTHLY, PRO_RATA, SEMIMONTHLY, or - in cases where there is no clear mapping - the original value passed through.

flsa_status.title: Flsa Status
flsa_status.description: The position's FLSA status. Possible values include: EXEMPT, SALARIED_NONEXEMPT, NONEXEMPT, OWNER, or - in cases where there is no clear mapping - the original value passed through.

relationship.description: The dependent's relationship with this employee

remote_id.description: The third-party API ID of the matching object.

modified_at.title: Modified At
modified_at.description: This is the datetime that this object was last updated by UnifyX

employee_number.title: Employee Number
employee_number.description: The employee's number that appears in the third-party integration's UI.

company.title: Company
company.description: The ID of the employee's company.

display_full_name.title: Display Full Name
display_full_name.description: The employee's full name, to use for display purposes. If a preferred first name is available, the full name will include the preferred first name.

username.title: Username
username.description: The employee's username that appears in the remote UI.

manager.title: Manager
manager.description: The employee ID of the employee's manager.

marital_status.title: Marital Status
marital_status.description: The employee's filing status as related to marital status

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date that the employee started working. If an employee was rehired, the most recent start date will be returned.

remote_created_at.title: Remote Created At
remote_created_at.description: When the third party's employee was created.

employment_status.title: Employment Status
employment_status.description: The employment status of the employee. Possible values include: ACTIVE, PENDING, INACTIVE, or - in cases where there is no clear mapping - the original value passed through.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.default: The URL of the employee's avatar image.

HrisEmployee.title: HrisEmployee
HrisEmployee.description: The Employee object is used to represent any person who has been employed by a company.

employee.title: Employee
employee.description: The employee whose payroll is being run.

gross_pay.title: Gross Pay
gross_pay.description: The total earnings throughout a given period for an employee before any deductions are made.

net_pay.title: Net Pay
net_pay.description: The take-home pay throughout a given period for an employee after deductions are made.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The day and time the benefit started.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The day and time the benefit ended.

check_date.title: Check Date
check_date.description: The day and time the payroll run was checked.

HrisEmployeePayrollRun.title: HrisEmployeePayrollRun
HrisEmployeePayrollRun.description: The EmployeePayrollRun object is used to represent an employee's pay statement for a specific payroll run.

pay_group.title: Pay Group
pay_group.description: The paygroup to which this pay cycle belongs to

run_state.title: Run State
run_state.description:
The state of the payroll run Possible values include: PAID, 
        DRAFT, APPROVED, FAILED, CLOSED. In cases where there is no clear mapping, 
        the original value passed through will be returned.

run_type.title: Run Type
run_type.description:
The type of the payroll run Possible values include: REGULAR, 
        OFF_CYCLE, CORRECTION, TERMINATION, SIGN_ON_BONUS. In cases where there is 
        no clear mapping, the original value passed through will be returned.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The day and time the payroll run started.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The day and time the payroll run ended.

check_date.title: Check Date
check_date.description: The day and time the payroll run was checked.

HrisPayrollRun.title: HrisPayrollRun
HrisPayrollRun.description: The PayrollRun object is used to represent a group of pay statements for a specific pay schedule.

approver.title: Approver
approver.description: The Unifyx ID of the employee with the ability to approve the time off request.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of this time off request.

employee_note.title: Employee Note
employee_note.description: The employee note for this time off request.
employee_note.example: Paid paid vacation! Scuba diving in Hawaii.

units.title: Units
units.description: The measurement that the third-party integration uses to count time requested.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The time off quantity measured by the prescribed units.

request_type.title: Request Type
request_type.description: The type of time off request.

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: The day and time of the start of the time requested off.

end_time.title: End Time
end_time.default: The day and time of the end of the time requested off.

HrisTimeOff.title: HrisTimeOff
HrisTimeOff.description: The TimeOff object is used to represent all employees' Time Off entries.

employee.description: The employee the balance belongs to.

balance.title: Balance
balance.description: The current remaining PTO balance, always measured in terms of hours.

used.title: Used
used.description: The amount of PTO used in terms of hours.

policy_type.title: Policy Type
policy_type.description: The policy type of this time off balance

HrisTimeOffBalance.title: HrisTimeOffBalance
HrisTimeOffBalance.description: The TimeOffBalance object is used to represent current balances for an employee's Time Off plan.
